data.title: Honor Rolls of Donors
data.text:
This website uses cookies. Find out more in our Privacy Policy.

The Honor Roll recognizes donors to all funds who made outright gifts, pledge payments and matching gift pledges between July 1, 2019, and June 30, 2020. All gifts of $2,500 or more including young alumnae leadership gifts (The Bell Ringer's Level) are part of the Tower Circle Society.
